bibl.title: Notes on Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. That Archilochus epode again. P. Colon. Inv. 7511 [= P. KÃ¶ln II, 58], 11-13 (Page, Suppl. Lyr. S 478. 16-18). - 2. The Chaeremon acrostic. [P. Hibeh II, 224 = P. Lond. Inv. 2989; TrGF 71 F 14 b.] - 3. A new piece of Alcman. [P. Oxy. XXVI, 2443 fr. 1 + XLV, 3213.] - 4. A fragment of Euripides' Protesilaos. [P. Oxy. XLV, 3214. 10-14.] - 5. A fragment of a Philoctetes. [P. Oxy. XLV, 3216 ("Tragedy").] - 6. A puzzle. [P. Oxy. XLV, 3239.]
